added: Confirmation popup when user is already in a game, but is trying to join another game or another server.
Technical tab in settings with storage info and live console for better debugging.
Light Mode support for all UIs on the roblox website. Popups have not been updated yet.
New Mobile Mode UI Improvements (Still experimental).
improved: Script Size reduced by ~63% (2.2 MB -> 850 KB).
Recent Servers now checks outside of the gamepage if you are in a game.
Recent Servers to check for server status.
SVG icons for better visual looks.
Code Refactor for better performance, maintainability, readability, and stuff like that.
Slight Smart Join Popup UI improvements.
Moved from ips to datacenters for checking server regions for smaller script size & accuracy.
Fast Server Search is now the default method for searching servers. You can still disable it in settings if it causes issues.
fixed: Some servers being flagged as Dallas when they are not. (Thx Orca Fan Also known as Waivy)
Fixed Recent Servers not working.
Best Connection not searching for high player servers -> Low player servers (if no high player servers found) correctly.

versions.description: Bug Fixes and Mobile Mode added. Still very experimental.

improved: XSS Attack Vectors Protection
Mutual Friends load a lot faster now
Auto Server Regions; Select how many servers to search. Customizable in settings.
fixed: Mutual Friends being very slow
Fixed recent servers not working.

versions.description: Major update, bug Fixes, and more

added: Server versions now show when searching for server regions, allowing you to find the oldest or newest servers.
improved: You can now move games around in Quick Launch Games.
Mutual Friends now shows the thumnbnail of the mutual friend.
Compact Private Servers UI improvements.
fixed: Fixed Mutual Friends not working.

versions.description: Major update, bug Fixes, and more

added: Compact Private Servers have been added. Enabled by default.
Custom Backgrounds: This allows you to change the background of the roblox website.
improved: You can now choose what the adblocker blocks/hides. Available in settings.
fixed: Fixed a bug where searching for servers would cause lag.
Fixed some bugs in GameQualityFilter.
Roblox fixing their server search limit again. Reverted back to 100 servers.
Limited Roblox server search to 50

improved: Servers have been added in Brazil. Yea :)
Best Connection
Restore Classic Terms (Added more terms & some language support)
Added more server regions (portland, seattle, columbus, ashburn, tokyo, etc)
fixed: GameQualityFilter Removing games form favorites and continue section

improved: Best Connection
Restore Classic Terms
fixed: Continue section not showing up
Fixed a bug where recent servers would not show up after a game was played.
Fixed Recent Servers not showing up after Roblox changed 'Friends' to 'Connections'.

versions.description: Added some features and fixed bugs

added: Added 'Clear All' button for recent servers.
Added toggle for server location popup in Settings.
improved: SmartSearch now prioritizes friends.
Finding server regions is now ~3x faster with fast search on. Also improved the fallback logic.
fixed: Fixed Serverhop button not showing a popup.
Fixed Quick Launch not working without SmartSearch.
Fixed duplicate arrow in server popup.
Fixed a bug where the setting remove all roblox ads would crash roblox if the extension ublock origin is installed.
Fixed margin error on homepage.
Fixed the script lagging when various popups are open.
Fixed the script not working on some games that have 0 players.
Fixed the bug with infinite location checking if user has no location set and refuses to set any location.
Fixed console flooding with debug logs when console logging is disabled.

versions.description: Added multiple new features including Smartsearch and Quick Launch Games

added: Added Smart Join Popup (Shows Server info like the region when you join a server)
improved: CSS Styles

versions.description: Server region improvements and new locations

added: New server regions: Portland, Oregon; Seattle, Washington; Columbus, Ohio
4 new functions for server region handling
improved: Server region UI for better usability
Code organization with centralized server region library

fixed: Various bugs

added: New Fast Server search feature (100x faster)

versions.description: Settings menu improvements and bug fixes

added: Set Default Location Mode in Advanced Settings
improved: Settings menu revamp
fixed: Bug with infinite location checking

versions.description: Added new features and UI improvements

improved: UI for server filters
Remove All Roblox Ads detection
fixed: Various bugs
Issue of script not recognizing servers existed
Various bugs

improved: Server regions filter UI

versions.description: Major UI overhaul and new settings menu

improved: Most UIs revamped
Accuracy of player count server filter
Accuracy of server regions

fixed: Various typos
improved: Player count popup alignment
UI color to match Roblox's Dark Mode
Multi-page UIs
Appearance of server selector by region

versions.description: Bug fix for connection button delay

fixed: Delay with best connection button

versions.description: New player location feature and additions

improved: Renamed UK servers to City of London for accuracy
Rewrote GUI code for Player Count popup
Rewrote GUI code for Server Region popup
Updated About me section
